data.message: Slim can I come over n make a rap CD in your studio ? If u don't like it you don't have to put your label on it or whatnot. I also have a blues country contemporary mix I'd like to lay on tracks and produce sing play guitar and harmonica in . get r dun u know what I'm saying.  All original all my own music yo. I could use some your fresh ass beats to kick some my raps to tho. Hit me up if u wanna get in the studio and do something different. Detroit vs everybody . I got next two days off but docs wednday and free on weekends. Let me know brother
